des: "Pisco is a style of brandy common to Peru and Chile which has a bit of a tequila flavor.  The egg white gives this tangy drink a smooth, full body.  Don't forget the bitters, they're the secret ingredient!"
ins: Place ice cubes, pisco, lemon juice, sugar, egg white, and bitters in the bowl of a blender.  Blend on high speed until finely pureed.  Pour into two glasses and garnish with an additional dash of bitters.
